last_episode_to_air.name: Girl Meets Goodbye
last_episode_to_air.overview: Friends and family gather at the Matthews’ home to help make a difficult decision.

name: Girl Meets World
overview: The adventures of relatable and adventurous Riley Matthews, the tween daughter of Cory and Topanga Matthews, and her bold best friend Maya as they traverse the twists and turns of teenage years at Manhattan's John Quincy Adams Middle School where Riley's dad is their History teacher.

episodes.name: Girl Meets World
episodes.overview: When Maya leads a rebellion in class, Riley joins in to try to be like her - much to her father, Cory's, dismay.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Boy
episodes.overview: In an attempt to get the students in his class to stop texting and communicate in person, Cory gives them a homework assignment that teaches them how to communicate face to face, ultimately sparking a real connection between Riley and Lucas.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Sneak Attack
episodes.overview: Riley becomes jealous when another girl flirts with Lucas, so she enlists Maya and Farkle's help to learn how to flirt too.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Father
episodes.overview: Cory struggles with Riley growing up when he learns she'd rather go to the school dance then participate in their yearly tradition of riding the Coney Island roller coaster. Simultaneously, he is dealing with the outcome of giving Maya an "F."

episodes.name: Girl Meets the Truth
episodes.overview: After Cory teaches a lesson on truth, Riley and Maya struggle with whether or not it was right to lie to Farkle and tell him he’s a good actor and if Maya should keep the locket she found, even though it doesn't belong to her.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Popular
episodes.overview: Riley is surprised when she gets invited to a party that doesn’t include Maya. However, once she arrives, she soon learns it’s a party filled with unpopular classmates.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Maya's Mother
episodes.overview: When Maya’s artwork is featured at a school event, Riley sees it as an opportunity to help Maya mend her relationship with her mother. Meanwhile, Cory and Topanga get a surprise visit from their childhood friend Minkus.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Smackle
episodes.overview: When Smackle, a debate champion from another school who happens to have a crush on Farkle, realizes that he only sees her as an academic rival, she enlists Maya and Riley to give her a makeover.

episodes.name: Girl Meets 1961
episodes.overview: Cory gives the class a living-history assignment that takes the four friends back to New York City in 1961.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Crazy Hat
episodes.overview: Cory divides his class into two fake companies for a lesson, one driven by profits and the other by making people happy. Meanwhile, Riley and Maya encounter a lady in the subway who is quite different than they first perceive her to be.

episodes.name: Girl Meets World: of Terror
episodes.overview: The kids face a trilogy of terror when Riley has a sleepover at Maya's with her Gammy Hart and pet ferret. Auggie confronts the monster under his bed, and Farkle tackles his most terrifying fear yet - playing softball.

guest_stars.character: Monster Under The Bed / Simon P. Littleboyeater
guest_stars.name: Nicolas Bechtel

episodes.name: Girl Meets the Forgotten
episodes.overview: When the kids are assigned a special lesson on appreciation, Riley and Maya are forced to work in the school cafeteria while Lucas and Farkle are assigned janitorial duty.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Flaws
episodes.overview: A classmate teases Farkle for being different and not fitting in with the crowd.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Friendship
episodes.overview: When Cory teaches his class about various forms of government, Lucas, Riley and Farkle decide to run against each other for 7th-grade class president.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Brother
episodes.overview: Cory and Topanga are going out to celebrate their anniversary and decide to let Riley babysit Auggie for the first time. She enlists Maya's help, which leads Auggie to rebel against the girls.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Home for the Holidays
episodes.overview: The Matthews clan hosts holiday dinner; Riley's grandparents and her Uncle Joshua come over, while Topanga stresses about her cooking skills; Corey's best friend Shawn sees his likeness in Maya and bonds with Riley.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Game Night
episodes.overview: Riley invites her friends along to join the traditional Matthews' Family Game Night, and Maya is excited to learn Riley's Uncle Josh is joining as well.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Master Plan
episodes.overview: Maya is celebrating her 14th birthday with Riley and the Matthews but is struggling with the fact that her mom probably won't be able to join them. Meanwhile, Cory and Riley devise a plan to setup Maya's mom with Shawn when he pays a visit.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Farkle's Choice
episodes.overview: Farkle has to choose between Riley and Maya as dates to an awards ceremony that he attends annually. Meanwhile, Topanga, Cory, and Auggie have a book club with Auggie's girlfriend, Ava.

episodes.name: Girl Meets First Date
episodes.overview: Cory agrees to let Lucas take Riley on a date but only if Maya and Farkle go with them as chaperones.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Gravity
episodes.overview: Riley and Maya are anxious to begin eighth grade and have a new teacher, that isn't Riley's father. Meanwhile, Mrs. Svorski asks Topanga to take over at the bakery.

episodes.name: Girl Meets the New World
episodes.overview: Riley and Lucas' classmates are curious as to what's going on with their relationship, which ultimately confuses them more than ever before.

episodes.name: Girl Meets the Secret of Life
episodes.overview: When Lucas' old friend from Texas comes to New York, Lucas begins to wonder if New York had really changed him, and he starts to keep secrets from Riley.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Pluto
episodes.overview: Cory, Topanga, Shawn, Riley and Maya travel to Philadelphia to dig up a time capsule that Cory, Topanga and Shawn buried 15 years ago which prompts the kids decide to create and bury one of their own.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Mr. Squirrels
episodes.overview: When Riley and Maya get into a fight, Cory enlists the help of his brother, Eric, to be a mediator.

episodes.name: Girl Meets the Tell-Tale-Tot
episodes.overview: Riley tells a lie so she and Maya can attend a party and must deal with the guilt of sneaking around her parents.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Rules
episodes.overview: When the entire class gets detention, the class divides and chaos ensues. Meanwhile, Auggie's friend Ava attempts to be nicer when she thinks she's losing him to another girl.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Hurricane
episodes.overview: Cory and Shawn take the girls out for a fun night, but just as Maya feels closer to Shawn, someone from his past comes back into his life and risks ruining everything.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Mr. Squirrels Goes to Washington
episodes.overview: Uncle Eric is recruited to run for the Senate, but learns it was only because they expected him to lose. Riley and her friends rally together to help his campaign.

episodes.name: Girl Meets the New Teacher
episodes.overview: A new teacher is hired and uses non-traditional ways of learning to engage the students, and the principal does not agree. Cory defends the teacher, which ultimately gets him in trouble too.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Fish
episodes.overview: It’s Riley’s turn to take the class fish home for the weekend, but it dies as soon as she gets it. Auggie suspects foul play.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Yearbook
episodes.overview: The kids aren’t satisfied with what they’ve been voted “Most Likely” for in the school yearbook, and take matters into their own hands to change it.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Semi-Formal
episodes.overview: Riley is asked to the semi-formal dance by a classmate named Charlie and is torn whether to go with him or Lucas. Meanwhile, Cory’s brother Eric is paid a visit from an old friend.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Creativity
episodes.overview: When art and music are threatened to be cut from school, the kids have to find a creative way to convince the school board to show their value.

episodes.name: Girl Meets I Am Farkle
episodes.overview: Riley, Maya and Lucas emphasize the beauty of being unique as they rally around their friend Farkle Minkus, who may be on the autism spectrum. Meanwhile, his friendship with another student, Smackle, grows fonder.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Cory and Topanga
episodes.overview: When Riley comes to the realization that her parents, Cory and Topanga, are making a positive impact in the world, she questions the impact she's making to the world.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Rileytown
episodes.overview: After Maya hurts Riley's feelings, the group learns that Riley is overly sensitive because another classmate is making fun of her. Riley's friends encourage her to like herself for who she is.

episodes.name: Girl Meets World: of Terror 2
episodes.overview: Riley and Maya meet the Ghost of the Bay Window, a flapper girl from the 1920's who makes people sing and dance!

episodes.name: Girl Meets Rah Rah
episodes.overview: It’s time for the annual cheerleading tryouts, and Riley is determined to finally make the squad.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Texas (1)
episodes.overview: Riley, Maya, and Farkle head to Texas with Lucas, who has been entered in the bull-riding competition at the rodeo in his hometown.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Texas (2)
episodes.overview: Riley, Maya, and Lucas try to figure out their feelings while they are in Texas together

episodes.name: Girl Meets Texas (3)
episodes.overview: Riley, Maya, and Lucas deal with the aftermath of what happened in Texas.

episodes.name: Girl Meets the Forgiveness Project
episodes.overview: When assigned to forgive others, Maya writes to her father to try to forgive him for leaving as Riley tries to forgive Auggie for destroying something precious to her.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Belief
episodes.overview: Cory asks the kids to challenge each other's beliefs to see if it changes their perspectives.

episodes.name: Girl Meets the New Year
episodes.overview: While at Riley’s New Year’s party, everyone is wondering who will be together at midnight.

episodes.name: Girl Meets STEM
episodes.overview: Riley becomes upset when the boys won't let her participate in a science experiment and tries to become more involved.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Money
episodes.overview: When Farkle’s dad makes a bad investment, Farkle becomes worried about what that might mean for his family.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Commonism
episodes.overview: Maya and Farkle are caught cheating on a test and have to face the school honor board! Meanwhile Auggie tries to figure out what he wants to be when he grows up.

episodes.name: Girl Meets the Bay Window
episodes.overview: Riley decides to redecorate the bay window; Maya is offended and hurt that Riley would violate their sacred space.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Legacy
episodes.overview: With middle school graduation around the corner, Riley, Maya, Lucas and Farkle work together to determine what kind of legacy they want to leave at John Quincy Adams.

episodes.name: Girl Meets High School Part 1
episodes.overview: Riley, Maya, Farkle and Lucas start their freshmen year and quickly learn their place as smaller fish in a much bigger lake.

episodes.name: Girl Meets High School Part 2
episodes.overview: The foursome continues to navigate the rigors of high school; some join sports teams while others choose academic clubs.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Jexica
episodes.overview: Riley's worried that her new classmates don't like the real her so she invents and online alter-ego named Jexica; Cory and Topanga face Auggie's internet usage.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Permanent Record
episodes.overview: Riley finds out the hard way that getting a bad grade in high school will count toward her permanent record.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Triangle
episodes.overview: Maya's art teacher implies that her friendship with Riley could be affecting her artist's voice, thus kicking her identity crisis into full gear.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Upstate
episodes.overview: Maya and Riley travel upstate to help Maya find her true artistic voice, but neglect to tell Cory and Topanga where they've gone.

episodes.name: Girl Meets True Maya
episodes.overview: Maya wants to do something bad to balance out all the good she's done lately.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Ski Lodge Part 1
episodes.overview: When Cory becomes the head of the Nature Club, the whole gang heads out on a trip to a familiar ski lodge

episodes.name: Girl Meets Ski Lodge Part 2
episodes.overview: The group's ski trip comes to an end, and Lucas must finally choose between Maya and Riley.

episodes.name: Girl Meets I Do
episodes.overview: Maya has some concerns about Shawn and Katy’s upcoming wedding.

episodes.name: Girl Meets the Real World
episodes.overview: Riley has trouble with her debate assignment when she must argue if people are naturally good or evil.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Bear
episodes.overview: Riley wakes to find her childhood teddy bear, Barry the Bear, missing and enlists the help of her family and friends to find him.

episodes.name: Girl Meets the Great Lady of New York
episodes.overview: Some students learn surprises about their diverse heritage during Cultural Week.

guest_stars.character: Ava Morgenstern / Marisol de la Cruz
guest_stars.name: Ava Kolker

episodes.name: Girl Meets She Don't Like Me
episodes.overview: Riley tries to make new friends in high school but everyone acts less friendly than she expects.

episodes.name: Girl Meets World of Terror 3
episodes.overview: Auggie hosts "Scary Time Theater" and shows what the world would be like if Riley and Maya had never met.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Her Monster
episodes.overview: Riley skips out on helping Topanga at the bakery to stay home and binge-watch her favorite TV show.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Hollyworld
episodes.overview: Maya schemes to sabotage another actress so that her mom will get a role in an upcoming movie.

episodes.name: Girl Meets a Christmas Maya
episodes.overview: It's Christmas time and Riley is excited to celebrate her favorite holiday, but for Maya the holidays only bring back unhappy memories from her childhood.

episodes.name: World Meets Girl
episodes.overview: Fans peek behind the scenes of Girl Meets World.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Sweet Sixteen
episodes.overview: With Riley’s 16th birthday approaching, the kids contemplate the future and how rapidly their relationships will change in a few short years.

episodes.name: Girl Meets Goodbye
episodes.overview: Friends and family gather at the Matthews’ home to help make a difficult decision.
